articles.author: Eliana Jordan
articles.title: Israel revises song lyrics to avoid disqualification from Eurovision - The Jewish Chronicle
articles.description: Original song entry ‘October Rain’ was rejected by EBU for ‘political’ lyrics that reference October 7 attacks
articles.content:
Israeli Eurovision entrant Eden Golan will be forced to change the lyrics to her song "October Rain," which EBU has rejected due to its "political" reference to the attacks of October 7.
